queries.query: huge wind creature that flies and resists lightning damage
queries.variant: massive air monster that can fly and is resistant to lightning attacks

queries.query: elemental that can move through narrow spaces and has a whirlwind attack
queries.variant: creature that can glide through tight spots and performs a whirlwind move

queries.query: flying elemental with high dexterity and multiple slam attacks
queries.variant: air-based creature with great agility and can do two slam moves

queries.query: monster that doesn't need air or food and has a lot of hit points
queries.variant: creature that requires no sustenance and has high health points

queries.variant: wind elemental with resistance to poison damage and can become prone
